forum.content:
Hi, I'm Sam.
I have been in Taiwan for a while already but am now looking for some new activity partners around Taipei. I am not trying to find language exchange here so we can exclusively chat in English. This also means that, although I have a natural predilection towards teaching (and explaining), I won't treat you like a student and I won't take a lot of effort to teach you new things unless it's holding back the conversation or opening the door for confusion.
Sounds good so far?

I like hiking, swimming, ubiking, and relaxing in nature. Preferably while talking about something deep and engaging (Politics, Philosophy, Sociology, Health). I don't know much about economics but if you do I would like to hear about it so that's a bonus. Also hoping to find someone who is able to drive the conversation sometimes so I don't have to do all the 'heavy lifting'.

Oh yeah....and let's avoid the same 10 starter questions that get asked every single time. I value original and unorthodox thought and conversations. That doesn't mean I will reject you if you ask the questions...but it makes for dull conversation.
forum.title: Activity partner.
